channel.title: PI making barrows degradable?
channel.description: Hello, can someone please provide me with a guide or a method on degrading barrows, i've tried alot and it isn't working

item.title: PI making barrows degradable?
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

combatAssistant class:

/* DEGRADING */ if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 0) { c.degradeTime++; } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == xxxx && c.degradeTime == 450) {// VLS Degrade. c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item c.sendMessage("Your vesta's longsword has degraded into nothing."); // send a message c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500 } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == xxxx && c.degradeTime == 500) {// STAT Degrade. c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item c.sendMessage("Your Statius warhammer has degraded into nothing."); // send a message c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500 } if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == xxxx && c.degradeTime == 450) {// Spear Degrade. c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item c.sendMessage("Your vesta's spear has degraded into nothing."); // send a message c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500 }

You’ll have to swap IDs, degradeTime, and sendMessage of course, but heres a start.

Read full topic
